itunes:title: Episode 054: Theresa Rourke Cassidy (feat. Valentine M. Smith)
title: Episode 054: Theresa Rourke Cassidy (feat. Valentine M. Smith)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 54 of CEREBRO, the first in a three-part HALLOWE'EN SPOOKTACULAR, Connor and artist Valentine M. Smith shriek it out with Theresa Rourke Cassidy, the spirited Siryn! The long-lost daughter of X-Man Banshee, Terry was raised by his wicked cousin Black Tom. After some time as a supporting character in the Claremont period, she became a star of X-Force and later X-Factor Investigations until she ascended as the new host of the Irish death goddess The Morrígan.

The CEREBRO character file on Siryn begins at 1:33:18.

(Content Advisory: Terry's story includes alcoholism, suicide, the Irish Troubles, and the loss of a child. This episode discusses miscarriage and stillbirth.)



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
